itemDescription: retired judge of the High Court of England and Wales

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Paul James Duke Coleridge (born 30 May 1949) is a retired judge of the High Court of England and Wales. He is currently the Chairman of the Marriage Foundation.

response: *  1949   – Paul Coleridge, English lawyer and judge
* Sir Paul Coleridge (born 1949), retired judge of the High Court of England and Wales
